channel.title: Comments on: Shimon Apisdorf on the Meaning of Rosh Hashanah
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Shlomo
item.dc:creator: Shlomo
item.description: Presumably this is aimed at Jews who come to shul twice a year. It presents Judaism (as the author conceives it) as a whole. The focus is not really on the particular elements of Rosh Hashana.
item.content:encoded: Presumably this is aimed at Jews who come to shul twice a year. It presents Judaism (as the author conceives it) as a whole. The focus is not really on the particular elements of Rosh Hashana.

item.title: By: pierre
item.dc:creator: pierre
item.description: I've been reading Kaminer's "I'm Dysfunctional, You're Dysfunctional", so I REALLY didn't need to reframe R. Apisdorf in my inner dialogue...his was one of the few Yomim Noraim services I could weather with any sense of change and accomplishment. It's been years now though. I would like to see your treatments of his "nutshell" series on theological matters.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been reading Kaminer’s “I’m Dysfunctional, You’re Dysfunctional”, so I REALLY didn’t need to reframe R. Apisdorf in my inner dialogue…his was one of the few Yomim Noraim services I could weather with any sense of change and accomplishment. It’s been years now though. I would like to see your treatments of his “nutshell” series on theological matters.
